scripts.bump-build: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const plist = require('plist'); const path = 'ios/App/App/Info.plist'; let data; try { data = fs.readFileSync(path, 'utf8'); } catch(e) { console.error('Info.plist not found'); process.exit(1); } const obj = plist.parse(data); const current = obj.CFBundleVersion || '1'; obj.CFBundleVersion = String(Number(current) + 1); fs.writeFileSync(path, plist.build(obj)); console.log('Build number bumped to ' + obj.CFBundleVersion);"
scripts.build-and-bump: npm run bump-build && npm run sync
scripts.prepare-deploy: npm run build-and-bump && git add . && git commit -m 'Bump build number' && git push
